bioconda.name: bioconductor-genomictuples
bioconda.summary: Representation and Manipulation of Genomic Tuples

biotools.summary: GenomicTuples defines general purpose containers for storing genomic tuples. It aims to provide functionality for tuples of genomic co-ordinates that are analogous to those available for genomic ranges in the GenomicRanges BioConductor package.

bioschemas.name: GenomicTuples
bioschemas.summary: GenomicTuples defines general purpose containers for storing genomic tuples. It aims to provide functionality for tuples of genomic co-ordinates that are analogous to those available for genomic ranges in the GenomicRanges BioConductor package.
